title: Prof. David Teece Inducted into Thinkers50 Hall of Fame
author: Natasha Payés
excerpt:
David Teece was inducted into the Thinkers50 Hall of Fame today (9/18/2020), joining management greats Peter Drucker, Clay Christenson, Michael Porter, and his long-time collaborator Ikujiro Nonaka, PhD 82.  London-based Thinkers50 recognizes distinguished thinkers who have made outstanding contributions to the knowledge of management. Teece will be recognized during a virtual induction event on September […]
The post Prof. David Teece Inducted into Thinkers50 Hall of Fame appeared first on Haas News | Berkeley Haas.
